Reviews.Title: Expensive and despite all the gadgets misses major important items
Reviews.Author: Karen
Reviews.Content: Expensive, and the case does not hold the camera.  The lens zoom is barely noticable and there is no flash with this camera.  Don't over buy like I did; get something that fills your needs.

Sony E-Mount SEL 1855 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 Zoom Lens

Intelligent Auto Focus
HDMI Output

3D Sweep PanoramaTM Mode
11 Picture Effect modes
Sony ExmorTM CMOS sensor
Sweep PanoramaTM Mode
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Alpha NEX-7 24.3 MP Compact Interchangeable Lens Camera with Sony E-Mount SEL 1855 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 Zoom Lens (Black) + Velsey Gadget Bag + 64GB SDXC Card + Travel charger + Card Reader + Giottos Cleaning Kit + Filter Kit
